law.history: Repealed 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 12, effective March 22, 2013. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 5, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 397, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1986.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Revocation of membership in bond pool.
